chunks.title: Chat Turn 1: User + Assistant
chunks.body:
User: Hi, I'm exploring your product. What can it do?

Assistant: Hello! I can help summarize documents, generate outlines, and answer questions using the selected context.

chunks.title: Chat Turn 2: User + Assistant
chunks.body:
User: I need a short summary for an email.

Assistant: Sure—what key points do you want included? I can keep it to 3–4 sentences.
